mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of property owned or controlled by the Charlottesville Land Co., Charlottesville, Va. Nov. 29th, 1890 / R.E. Shaw, Engr
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Charlottesville Land Company (Charlottesville, Va.)
Shaw, R. E.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 39 x 66 cm. on sheet 44 x 71 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Descriptive text which follows the title is set in type, and includes information about lot sizes and street widths. "Shaw Del." does not appear on the map.
"For full information, apply to John M. White, Secretary, Charlottesville, Va.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Has been altered in pencil to show the site of a "Proposed lake - July, 1911." Mounted on linen. Purchase.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Charlottesville Land Company (Charlottesville, Va.)
Real property--Virginia--Charlottesville--Maps.
Real estate development--Virginia--Charlottesville--Maps.
Charlottesville (Va.)--Maps.
